title: Naruto Shippuden Ultimate Ninja Storm 3 [PAL] [RUSENG]
description:
Information:
Year: 2013
Genre: Dogfight / Fighting
Developer: CyberConnect2
Publisher: Namco Bandai Games
Code Disc: BLES01764
Publication Type: Repack
Language: Russian  English
Firmware: CFW 3.55 / CFW 4.21 + Media
Type: Internal HDD

Description:
Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 3 - is a new adventure residents of the Village Hidden in the foliage. The game features more than 80 characters, which makes it the most capacious project in its genre. But something remains the same - a dynamic action, impressive combat system and, of course, epic battle with the powerful bosses. first time, fans of the Naruto universe will be able to personally confront treacherous nine-tailed demon fox. Fascinating Story Mode will take part in well-known on the original manga and anime episodes and fragments of stories in the new village of Konoha. than ever exciting, reliable and impressive story of Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 3 will give you the most unforgettable adventures!

Installation Disk:
1. Write the file (s) to disk. 
2. Insert the disc in the console and go to the Game  Install Package Files 
3. Select the installation file, and press X. 
4. Run the game through HMV.
Installation with Flash cards:
1. Copy the file (s) to the media. 
2. Insert Flash into the console and go to the Game  Install Package Files 
3. Select the installation file, and press X. 
4. Run the game through HMV.
